item.description:
I'll be outside by 8:45. You recognize me by my lovely cane. (It doubles as a nerd prod! ) The showing starts at 9:30, and you should get there early. There is no scheduled dinner, sorry.

NEW TICKET DETAILS!

Go to brattlefilm.org to reserve your space! It's listed on the main page under "Coming Soon." Five dollars per showing, or spend $25 and you'll also walk away with a snazzy T-shirt. Hooked on Who does sell-out, so please, please reserve your tickets now. Brattle has good popcorn, real butter, and beer on tap from Cambridge Brewing Company.

This is just night one of a two-night event. I've added the second of the Tom Baker selections on Saturday (The Invasion of Time @ 9:30) There is also an earlier batch of Baker at 2:30 (The Invisible Enemy & K9 & Company), which I will be attending, but not organizing formally.

Hooked on Who returns to the Brattle. Come see one of David Tennant's last turns as the Doctor in PLANET OF THE DEAD. Michelle Ryan (Jekyll, Bionic Woman, Merlin) co-stars as the companion of the day. There's a red double-decker bus in a desert, and presumably a threat of death. Any more information would qualify as spoilers, and the Doctor is staunchly in the no spoilers camp.

Please include in your RSVP if you are interested in dinner before PLANET OF THE DEAD.

On a personal note, this is my very first time as an assistant organizer. Please be gentle with me, my fellow nerds.
item.name: Doctor Who at the Brattle: Planet of the Dead
